definition: distributed or sold illicitly, the part of a boot above the instep, to produce or distribute illegally
details:
adjective
- distributed or sold illicitly
= synonyms: black
noun
- the part of a boot above the instep
- whiskey illegally distilled from a corn mash
= synonyms: moonshine, corn liquor
verb
- to produce or distribute illegally
= example: to produce or distribute illegally
- to sell illicit products such as drugs or alcohol
= example: to sell illicit products such as drugs or alcohol
